title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. As a result, the second row is also removed from the layout. Additionally, when the delete occurs, the Launch item is moved from the second row to the first row.
EB: When the Delete button is pressed, only the first item on the second row should be deleted. The second row of the layout should remain intact. The Launch item should stay on the second row and not be moved to the first row.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Run the attached test case. 
2. Drag the Open Type coolitem to the second row (last coolItem). 
3. Drag the Launch coolitem (last coolItem on the first row) to the second row, placing it after the Open Type item. 
4. Drag the Search coolitem to the second row, placing it after the Launch coolitem. 
5. Drag the Script coolitem to the second row (last coolItem on the first row), placing it after the Search coolitem. 
6. Press the Delete button. This will delete the first item on the second row. Notice that the second row is removed when the delete occurs. The second row should remain intact.
